name: getteams
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool nhl_stats_and_live_data.
Tool description: Get live data and stats about any NHL game, teams, players, drafts and many more.

API description: Fetches NHL team data for a given season with optional expanded information.

season.description: The specific season to return team data for. Defaults to 20172018.

expand.description: A parameter to expand the response with additional data, such as team rosters. Defaults to 'team.roster'.
